@bryanboyer I belonged to e 2008 gang. Worked in a small firm under a tyrant supervisor. Left after a few months. Entered a big firm. Recession followed. Got retrenched. Found work in a small firm 1 year on. Serendipitous, found a lecturing post at my alma mater. Next year - post grad at 40.
